value.title: Refer to a value, column or row in Power Query
value.excerpt: Have you ever tried to use a specific column, row or value in power query, but didnt now how to do it?  In this video I will show you how to refer to a specific column, row or value using simple commands in power query.   Looking for a download file? value.title: Are you backing up your Power BI Dataset???
value.excerpt: While Power BI is a SaaS service, backing up your dataset is still important. What if something was accidently deleted? How do you recover it? Patrick shows you how you can get a backup / restore process in place so you can sleep at night.  Backup/Restore PowerShell Script: https://guyinacu.be/backuprestorescript
